attributes.action: pay lay off pay at normal daily wage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The economy is in a mess at the minute due to the credit crunch with mass lay off's planned and mass redundancies.
I think the current labour government should make the lay off pay which is currently £20.40 to go up on the 2nd of feb to £21.50 up to your current daily wage. The workers anti conservative government did it in the 1980's so the labour government of today who state that they have got the best intrest's of the workers of britain at heart should do it. If not millions of workers could lose everything they have worked for.
